text: Chisimu kuchelewasya (mwesi wakuchimbichika kuti uŵe wamalaŵi m’malo mwaunouno) kuŵele konjechesya pa ukafili, akusochelesyedwa nayo aŵala ŵaakanile, (mwesi umopeo) akuutenda kuŵa mwesi wamba chaka chine, chaka chine ni kuutenda kuŵa ŵakuchimbichika, kuti awutile chiŵalanjilo cha (myesi) jaajitesile Allah kuŵa jakuchimbichika (kuti jikwanile), basi ni akujitenda (myesi) jakuchimbichika jila kuŵa (myesi) wamba. Isalalisidwe kukwao itendo yao yangalumbana, soni Allah ngakwajongolaga ŵandu achimakafili
